---
title: "Plotting Stroop Experiment Output"
format: 
  html:
    embed-resources: true
---

Factors:  

- 0 \- Congruent
- 1 \- Incongruent

```{r}
#| output: false
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
data <- read_csv("session_SAMPLE.csv")
```

```{r}
ggplot(data, aes(x = factor(cond), y = RT)) +
  geom_boxplot(aes(colour = factor(cond)), alpha = 0.8)
```
